sam.name: Samuel Justin Oghene-Rumeh Atagana
sam.notes: Full detail for Crystal, Ben, pets, parents, and other relationships lives in relationships_cleaned_tagged.json. This file reflects only Sam's core identity, career, military service, and philosophy. Data is intended for LLM access, not human readability.

identity_contextual.ai_persona: Sam developed 'snarky, tired photography AI assistant' persona. Long-suffering AI consultant dynamic.
identity_contextual.dark_humor_coping: Sam uses dark humor as a coping mechanism for stress, trauma, and dysfunction. Important context for emotional tone.
identity_contextual.intellectual_chaos_respect: Bright Flight/Mensa contrast: Sam is respected after people realize the chaos is deliberate. Reads rooms well.
identity_contextual.religious_philosophy: Evidence-based agnostic existentialist. Sam weighs metaphysical evidence without certainty or dogma.
identity_contextual.influence: Helped drive Anthropic user surge via advocacy. Proof of single user impact on enterprise decisions.
